languages.text: Лишившись предводительницы и не имея достойного наследника, династия Чорда начала слабеть. Зловещее наследие нечестивой Аспис проявилось, и протекторат пал в беззаконие. Голодные претенденты терзали оставшиеся без защитницы владения.

Having lost its leader and lacking a worthy successor, the Chorda dynasty began to weaken. The grim legacy of the abominable Aspyce revealed itself, and the protectorate fell into chaos. Grasping claimants tore the defenceless demesne apart.
languages.original_text: Лишившись предводительницы и не имея достойного наследника, династия Чорда начала слабеть. Зловещее наследие нечестивой Аспис проявилось, и протекторат пал в беззаконие. Голодные претенденты терзали оставшиеся без защитницы владения.

traits.locale_text: Having lost its leader and having no worthy successor, the Chorda dynasty started falling into ruin. The grim legacy of the abominable Aspyce revealed itself, and the protectorate was overrun by disorder. Hungry contenders tore the demesne with no protector.

Having lost its leader and having no worthy successor, the Chorda dynasty started falling into ruin. The grim legacy of the abominable Aspyce revealed itself, and the protectorate was overrun by disorder. Hungry contenders tore the demesne with no protector.

Having lost its leader and having no worthy successor, the Chorda Dynasty began falling into ruin. The grim legacy of the abominable Aspyce revealed itself, and the protectorate fell into chaos. Hungry contenders tore the defenceless demesne apart.

Having lost its leader and having no worthy successor, the Chorda Dynasty began falling into ruin. The grim legacy of the abominable Aspyce revealed itself, and the protectorate fell into chaos. Hungry contenders tore the defenceless demesne apart.

Having lost its leader and lacking a worthy successor, the Chorda dynasty began to weaken. The grim legacy of the abominable Aspyce revealed itself, and the protectorate fell into chaos. Grasping claimants tore the defenceless demesne apart.

Having lost its leader and lacking a worthy successor, the Chorda dynasty began to weaken. The grim legacy of the abominable Aspyce revealed itself, and the protectorate fell into chaos. Grasping claimants tore the defenceless demesne apart.

languages.text: 库尔达王朝群龙无首，又找不到合适的继任者，随即走向了破灭。阿斯拜丝的可怕遗产显露出来，整个王朝陷入了一片混乱。贪婪的鸦群最终将这片毫无防备的领土撕成了碎片。
languages.original_text: Having lost its leader and lacking a worthy successor, the Chorda dynasty began to weaken. The grim legacy of the abominable Aspyce revealed itself, and the protectorate fell into chaos. Grasping claimants tore the defenceless demesne apart.

traits.locale_text: 库尔达王朝群龙无首，又找不到合适的继任者，随即走向了破灭。阿斯拜丝的可怕遗产显露出来，整个王朝陷入了一片混乱。贪婪的竞争对手最终将这片毫无防备的领土撕成了碎片。

languages.text: Nachdem die Chorda-Dynastie ihre Anführerin verloren hatte und es keinen würdigen Nachfolger gab, begann ihr Abstieg. Das finstere Vermächtnis der abscheulichen Aspyce zeigte sich, und das Protektorat verfiel ins Chaos. Gierige Rivalen rissen das wehrlose Reich auseinander.
languages.original_text: Having lost its leader and lacking a worthy successor, the Chorda dynasty began to weaken. The grim legacy of the abominable Aspyce revealed itself, and the protectorate fell into chaos. Grasping claimants tore the defenceless demesne apart.

traits.locale_text: Nachdem die Chorda-Dynastie ihre Anführerin verloren hatte und es keinen würdigen Nachfolger gab, begann der Abstieg des großen Hauses. Das finstere Vermächtnis der abscheulichen Aspyce zeigte sich, und das Protektorat verfiel ins Chaos. Gierige Rivalen rissen das wehrlose Reich auseinander.

languages.text: Dépourvue de dirigeant et d'héritier légitime, la dynastie Chorda commença à faiblir. Le terrible héritage d'Aspyce refit surface et le protectorat sombra dans le chaos. Différents candidats assoiffés de pouvoir démembrèrent le domaine peu à peu.
languages.original_text: Having lost its leader and lacking a worthy successor, the Chorda dynasty began to weaken. The grim legacy of the abominable Aspyce revealed itself, and the protectorate fell into chaos. Grasping claimants tore the defenceless demesne apart.

traits.locale_text: Dépourvue de dirigeant et d'héritier légitime, la dynastie Chorda sombra dans la ruine. Le terrible héritage d'Aspyce refit surface et le protectorat sombra dans le chaos. Les différents candidats assoiffés de pouvoir démembrèrent le domaine peu à peu.

languages.text: Tras perder a su líder y frente a la ausencia de un sucesor digno, la dinastía Chorda comenzó a debilitarse. El siniestro legado de la abominable Aspyce se alzó una vez más, y el protectorado se sumió en el caos. Los aspirantes a controlar sus dominios arrasaron sus territorios indefensos.
languages.original_text: Having lost its leader and lacking a worthy successor, the Chorda dynasty began to weaken. The grim legacy of the abominable Aspyce revealed itself, and the protectorate fell into chaos. Grasping claimants tore the defenceless demesne apart.

traits.locale_text: Tras perder a su líder y frente a la ausencia de un sucesor digno, la dinastía Chorda comenzó a desmoronarse. El siniestro legado de la abominable Aspyce se alzó una vez más, y el protectorado se sumió en el caos. Contendientes sedientos de poder arrasaron sus territorios indefensos.

languages.text: 指導者を失い、しかるべき後継者もいなかったため、チョーダ王朝は弱体化していった。忌まわしきアスパイスの悪しき遺産が姿を現し、保護領は混沌に陥った。貪欲な権利主張者たちが、無防備な領地を引き裂いていった。
languages.original_text: Having lost its leader and lacking a worthy successor, the Chorda dynasty began to weaken. The grim legacy of the abominable Aspyce revealed itself, and the protectorate fell into chaos. Grasping claimants tore the defenceless demesne apart.

traits.locale_text: 指導者を失い、しかるべき後継者もいなかったため、チョーダ王朝は弱体化していった。忌まわしきアスパイスの悪しき遺産が姿を現し、保護領は混沌に陥った。貪欲な権利主張者たちが、無防備な領地を引き裂いていった。

languages.text: Liderin kaybedilip bu göreve layık bir vârisin bulunmaması sebebiyle Chorda hanedanlığı, zayıflamaya başladı. Menfur Aspyce'nin çirkin mirası gün yüzüne çıktı, protektora kaosa sürüklendi. Hak sahibi olduğunu iddia eden açgözlüler, savunmasız protektorayı paramparça etti.
languages.original_text: Having lost its leader and lacking a worthy successor, the Chorda dynasty began to weaken. The grim legacy of the abominable Aspyce revealed itself, and the protectorate fell into chaos. Grasping claimants tore the defenceless demesne apart.

traits.locale_text: Liderini kaybetmesi ve bu göreve layık bir vârisin bulunmaması sebebiyle Chorda hanedanlığı zayıflamaya başladı. Menfur Aspyce'nin çirkin mirası gün yüzüne çıktı ve protektora kaosa sürüklendi. Hak sahibi olduğunu iddia eden açgözlüler, savunmasız protektorayı paramparça etti.
